scripts.build:zig: mkdir -p ./pkg/zig && zig build-exe src-zig/lib.zig -Dcpu_features_add=simd128 -target wasm32-freestanding -O ReleaseFast -fno-entry --export=get_buffer_ptr --export=zig_xed25519_create_keypair_ptr --export=zig_xed25519_sign_ptr --export=zig_xed25519_verify_ptr -femit-bin=./pkg/zig/benchmark.wasm -fstrip -flto -mcpu=mvp+simd128 -fsingle-threaded && wasm-opt ./pkg/zig/benchmark.wasm -o ./pkg/zig/benchmark.wasm -O4 --enable-bulk-memory --enable-simd
scripts.build: npm run build:zig && npm run build:rust
